title: Simulation-Based Training for Developing Mathematics Instructional Materials for Pre-Service Teachers

context.prior_knowledge: Expert-level knowledge and experience in solving complex problems
context.additional_context: A process of designing instructional materials while experiencing real classroom scenarios in virtual classrooms

learning_goals: Learners can develop ≥3 types of middle school mathematics (equations/geometry) lesson materials in VR environments.
They can revise and improve lesson design plans ≥2 times by incorporating peer feedback.
They can create interactive instructional materials using digital tools (smartboards, 3D modeling).
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
